docs.text: MkDocs Windows 98 Theme Dust off your digital nostalgia with this MKDocs Windows 98 theme! Because sometimes, even our documents deserve to relive the glory days when screens were blurry and icons resembled pixelated hieroglyphs from a digital Stone Age.
docs.title: MkDocs Windows 98 Theme

docs.text: Dust off your digital nostalgia with this MKDocs Windows 98 theme! Because sometimes, even our documents deserve to relive the glory days when screens were blurry and icons resembled pixelated hieroglyphs from a digital Stone Age.
docs.title: MkDocs Windows 98 Theme

docs.text: Getting Started Installation To begin, install the mkdocs-windows-98 package by executing the following command in the command line: pip install mkdocs-windows-98 Configuration In your mkdocs.yml file, include windows-98 in the theme section as follows: theme: name: windows-98
docs.title: Getting Started

docs.text: To begin, install the mkdocs-windows-98 package by executing the following command in the command line: pip install mkdocs-windows-98
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: In your mkdocs.yml file, include windows-98 in the theme section as follows: theme: name: windows-98
docs.title: Configuration
